channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Jigomerge Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Jigomerge Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34806|2024-08-03T09:22:10.546Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jigomerge%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Jigomerge Plugin 0.9 and earlier stores passwords unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins controller where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the Jenkins controller file system.
